thread.title: On a Roll: MediaLab 3D Solutions Wins Two W3 Awards
thread.title_full: On a Roll: MediaLab 3D Solutions Wins Two W3 Awards - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: On a Roll: MediaLab 3D Solutions Wins Two W3 Awards
text:
Among Inc. 5000's Fastest Growing, MediaLab 3D Solutions is rapidly gaining recognition for animation work on national branding and advertising campaigns.
Tampa, FL (PRWEB) October 18, 2015
MediaLab 3D Solutions was selected from over 4,800 entries as a winner in the Branded Content and Online Video categories of the 10th Annual W3 Awards. Tampa based MediaLab is on a roll having won two silver W3 awards on the heels of winning three Telly Awards and making Inc. 5000’s Fastest-Growing Private U.S. Companies List.
“MediaLab’s animation let the customers see exactly how the pitcher worked, really demonstrating the product’s story,” said Kate Weber, Sr. Manager of Marketing and E-Commerce at Contigo. “We had to show the key features and benefits in an entertaining and educational way.” The result – an innovative animation that brought Contigo’s Pitcher Demonstration to life and led to a silver W3 award for the Branded Content category.
With a unique take on advertising, Kwikset’s SmartCode 916 spot brought home a silver W3 award in the Online Video category. Featuring compelling visuals, and dab of entertainment, the animation is quickly gaining recognition for Spectrum Brands after winning a bronze Telly.
About MediaLab 3D Solutions
MediaLab 3D Solutions is an end-to-end digital imagery and visualizations provider that is always on the leading edge of innovation in digital design, creative capital and technological advances. We recognize that as stewards of our customers’ brands, we are entrusted with putting forth digital content that reflects their values and personality. Through our unique, fun collaborative culture, we constantly strive to advance what we do, how we do it and who we partner with. Our pixels and storytelling expertise deliver ideas that motivate audiences to action.
About the W3 Awards
The W³ Awards honors creative excellence on the web, and recognizes the creative and marketing professionals behind award winning websites, web video and online marketing programs. In determining winners, entries are judged based on a standard of excellence as determined by the Academy of Interactive and Visual Arts (AIVA). These winners represent the best work of the most respected advertising agencies, public relations firms, interactive agencies, and other creative professionals.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13027496.htm
